      • shouldAutoAssignTaskIfSingleResult

        public boolean shouldAutoAssignTaskIfSingleResult()
        This method make the engine assign automatically the task if the result of #filter() is only one element. i.e. when the task is filtered only for a single user Default implementation returns true
        Specified by:
        shouldAutoAssignTaskIfSingleResult in interface UserFilter
        Returns:
        true if we should assign task when there is only one result.
